contentrichtext.text: ''Free Culture'' cover; fair use, also licensed under the [[Creative Commons]] [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/1.0/ "Attribution-Non-commercial" (by-nc)] license. == Licensing == {{Non-free book cover|image has rationale=yes}} == Fair use rationale == {{Non-free use rationale |Article=Free Culture (book) |Description=Cover of Free Culture (book) . |Source=Copied from [http://free-culture.cc/ http://free-culture.cc/] website, and intellectual property owned by {{#if:{{{3|}}}|{{{3}}}|[http://free-culture.cc/ http://free-culture.cc/] }}. |Portion=Book cover only. |Low_resolution=Sufficient resolution for illustration, but considerably lower resolution than original. |Purpose=Book cover is used for purposes of illustration in the [[Free Culture (book) ]] article, a subject of public interest. |Replaceability=Image is protected by copyright, therefore a free use alternative won't exist. |other_information=}} {{Non-free book cover|image has rationale=yes}}
